title: For sale lot of 15 raw T206 Southern Leaguers SOLD
author: drdduet

posts.post_title: For sale lot of 15 raw T206 Southern Leaguers SOLD
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a nice lot of 15 different SLers from F to VG--8 are Old Mill and 7 are Pied 350.  Fit nicely in a tobacco card page....send email to [url]darren.duet@chouest.com[/url] for scan or inquiries.
$550 for lot--priority, insured delivery....SOLD

Could I see scans, please?  Please send to [url]bowen@bowenlaw.us[/url].  Thanks.

Marty
